ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 15 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D7100 Digital SLR Camera & 18-105mm VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Black) + <2> Nikon 70-300mm G VR AF-S Lens + <3> Samyang 500mm Telephoto Lens +
<4> Transcend 32GB Class10 SD Card + <5> Spare EN-EL15 Battery + <6> Vivitar 67mm UV Glass Filter + <7> Additional Vivitar 67mm UV Glass Filter +
<8> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <9> Rokinon 67" Monopod & Case + <10> PD Laptop/Tablet DSLR Backpack + <11> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<12> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <13> T Mount for Nikon + <14> Instruction Sheet for T-Mount + <15> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D7100 Digital SLR Camera & 18-105mm VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Black) with 70-300mm VR Lens + 500mm Tele Lens + 32GB Card + Battery + Backpack + Accessory Kit
